last_episode_to_air.name: Jericho
last_episode_to_air.overview: A woman sentenced to hang for the murder of her husband is sent a second chance by a Government Agent.

name: Dick Powell's Zane Grey Theatre
overview: Dick Powell's Zane Grey Theatre, sometimes simply called Zane Grey Theatre, is an American Western anthology series which ran on CBS from 1956 to 1961.

episodes.name: You Only Run Once
episodes.overview: When horses begin to turn up missing, the county forms a vigilante committee. Rancher Matt Jessop has the bad luck to innocently hire two shady characters to work on his ranch. Will the two drag Matt and his family down with them?

episodes.name: The Fearful Courage
episodes.overview: After witnessing a murder Louise Brandon is then hunted by the gunmen who want to end her life for fear she will testify.

episodes.name: The Long Road Home
episodes.overview: A man returns to his Texas home with his mind set on accomplishing two things, he wants to avenge his brother's death and also settle an old feud.

episodes.name: The Unrelenting Sky
episodes.overview: When the drought causes much suffering in a small town and one man has water but will not let anyone near his ranch or land the citizens take matters into their own hands for survival.

episodes.name: The Lariat
episodes.overview: After serving five years for accidentally killing a man with a lariat, Morgan returns to seek justice from the Judge who sentenced him.

episodes.name: Death Watch
episodes.overview: After his troops are killed Captain Warling decides to face the Indians alone, they turn and flee when they realize that the Captain is no longer in his right mind and they fear evil spirits may come after them.

episodes.name: Stage to Tucson
episodes.overview: Marshal Thorpe has received a tip that bank robber Bide Turley is on the stage from Las Cruces to Tucson.

episodes.name: A Quiet Sunday in San Ardo
episodes.overview: Retired gunfighter wants to live a peaceful quiet life but there are those that won't let that happen.

episodes.name: Vengeance Canyon
episodes.overview: After his son is murdered Joe seeks revenge on his killer.

episodes.name: Return to Nowhere
episodes.overview: An outlaw gunfighter is haunted by his past and is trying to find his life. He goes looking for his wife and finds she is married to another man. He is determined to get her back.

episodes.name: Courage is a Gun
episodes.overview: A gunslinger is wounded by the marshal in a shooting while waiting to settle a feud. He then plots to kill the marshal as well.

episodes.name: Muletown Gold Strike
episodes.overview: Mason Ward just back from the war discovers his law office destroyed he heads west to a new town and another job. Hired by the mayor as the new schoolteacher, he learns of a treasure map from one of his students.

episodes.name: Stars Over Texas
episodes.overview: When a Wagon from Indiana is ambushed and burned by bushwackers, little Annie Morgan loses her family and gains a new one in the Todds.

episodes.name: The Three Graves
episodes.overview: A gunman moves into a sleepy western town with the intention of taking it over for himself. But a pretty young woman sets her sights on him as a prospective husband.

episodes.name: No Man Living
episodes.overview: A sheriff gives up his badge to exact personal revenge on an outlaw who has wronged him. The criminal he seeks has carefully disguised himself as a lawabiding citizen.

episodes.name: Time of Decision
episodes.overview: A land baron's son provokes a homesteader into a gun fight and ends up dead. The town hates homesteaders but finds a kindly allie in Evan Tapper.

episodes.name: Until the Man Dies
episodes.overview: Cattle rancher Clint Belmet saves criminal Dave Jordan from a lynching determined not to allow mob rule to deprive Nevada of her chance for statehood.

episodes.name: Back Trail
episodes.overview: Ex-gunman John Fallon takes on the town bullies who are trying to get rid of the farmers and take their land.

episodes.name: Dangerous Orders
episodes.overview: Captain Hunter is sent to deliver important orders to the next fort and encounters several disruptions along his way. A turncoat, a drunk, a Confederate spy and Indians.

episodes.name: The Necessary Breed
episodes.overview: Bounty hunter, Link returns to the town where he once lived, killing a man the town thinks is innocent of the crime they demand he pay for the crime.

episodes.name: The Hanging Tree
episodes.overview: The town is out to hang a man without the marshal around, they become the judge jury and executioner.

episodes.name: Village of Fear
episodes.overview: A traveling book salesman is greeted by a dead man hanging in an alley when he arrives in a deserted Western town.

episodes.name: Black Creek Encounter
episodes.overview: A man is faced with a difficult decision when challenged by a gunman who has searched for him for years. To accept the challenge would mean almost certain death.

episodes.name: There Were Four
episodes.overview: A young man vows to get revenge on a wealthy rancher. He uses lawless methods because he regards an outlaw he knows as a hero. These methods, however, result in his being involved in a rustling scheme.

episodes.name: Fugitive
episodes.overview: Fleeing from Union soldiers, an ex-Confederate is helped by a young widow, who believes he's a Union man. The soldier soon realizes he has fallen in love with the widow.

episodes.name: A Time to Live
episodes.overview: A dance-hall singer tries to dissuade the man she loves from seeking revenge on a man who shot him and left him for dead.

episodes.name: Black is for Grief
episodes.overview: After serving in the Union Army, a young man learns that his wife has been murdered. In trying to find the killer he learns a strange story.

episodes.name: Badge of Honor
episodes.overview: Returning from the Civil War and tired of violence and bloodshed, Hoby Gilman is shocked to find his hometown in the grip of the cruel and power mad Colonel Boyd Nelson.

episodes.name: Decision at Wilson's Creek
episodes.overview: The Battle of Wilson's Creek occurred August 10, 1861 along Wilson's Creek, about ten miles south of Springfield. This six hour battle is considered to be the second major battle of the Civil War and the first major battle west of the Mississippi River.

episodes.name: Man on the Run
episodes.overview: An outlaw on the run winds up at a ranch run by more outlaws who have taken over the ranch. Duane tries to help the sisters regain control of the ranch.

episodes.name: The Deserters
episodes.overview: Sergeant Major Dravo is on the trail of deserters, and his disgust with these traitors has no bounds.

episodes.name: Blood in the Dust
episodes.overview: Yankee Jim Horncuff is confronted by gunman Burke.

episodes.name: A Gun is for Killing
episodes.overview: ""Make your play Billy Jack,"" says young Bobby as he pretends with his father's pistol, which is against the family's rules. But when the real Billy Jack shows up in town and threatens the Andrews family trouble begins for Russ who can't find his gun.

episodes.name: Proud Woman
episodes.overview: When Consuela Bowers arrives in the West, she hires a man to work on her father's ranch. She does not know that he is a professional gunman.

episodes.name: Ride a Lonely Trail
episodes.overview: The town council decides to retire old Sheriff Larson against much protest from the oldtime sheriff himself who does not want to be put out to pasture. He tries to prove to the town just how valuable and useful he still is.

episodes.name: The Promise
episodes.overview: A dying rancher forces his restless young son to promise he will remain on the ranch with his older brother Noah.

episodes.name: Episode in Darkness
episodes.overview: Traveling cattleman Ethan Boyan is framed in a frontier town for the slaying of a woman in a stagecoach holdup. The only person present when the crime was committed was Isabelle Rutledge, an embittered blind woman.

episodes.name: The Open Cell
episodes.overview: Sheriff Morgan Winter decides to give a young man involved in a shooting another chance by taking him into his custody for a year. But the rest of the town, including Winter's deputy, just wants to see the boy fail and get sent up to prison.

episodes.name: A Man to Look Up To
episodes.overview: Lawyer Jud Lester is just arriving in town right after a robbery when he finds one of the robbers hiding in his office wounded. The robber passes out and people in town assume that Jud shot him, and treat him as a hero. Unfortunately Jud decides to let them keep thinking this, and helps make plans to capture the rest of the gang when the captured man is scheduled to be hanged. But things may backfire.

episodes.name: The Bitter Land
episodes.overview: A matriarch is adamanant about keeping the Spring Waters for her ranch and endangers her grandson, while other ranchers seek to use the water for their cattle, trouble ensues.

episodes.name: Gift From a Gunman
episodes.overview: After he is wounded in a gun duel, Will Gorman resolves to forsake the gunman's life. He visits an old friend, whose restless wife and gun-eager son weaken his resolution to reform.

episodes.name: A Gun for My Bride
episodes.overview: The daughter of a wealthy cattleman elopes with one of her father's ranch hands. Then he learns that her new husband is a fugitive from justice.

episodes.name: Man Unforgiving
episodes.overview: Ex-army Medical corp doctor Ben Harper winds up in a town run by a crippled sheriff who holds a personal grudge against the doctor.

episodes.name: Trial by Fear
episodes.overview: Gunslinger Tod Owen is on trial for murder, when he is found not guilty, it comes out that the dead man's brother had more reason to want his brother dead.

episodes.name: The Freighter
episodes.overview: Belle is running a freightline outfit. Murdock and his sons are causing problems for Belle and are forcing a merger the hard way. Without the contracts needed for her line, the Murdocks make life miserable for Belle and her Grandfather who founded the line.

episodes.name: This Man Must Die
episodes.overview: A sentenced to hang man escapes and returns to his home town to kill the witness whose false testimony convicted him.

episodes.name: Wire
episodes.overview: A man who has spent most of his life working other people's property, vows to own land of his own. He homesteads on government land until violence breaks out with ranchers who want the land for grazing.

episodes.name: License to Kill
episodes.overview: A frontier sheriff finds he is unable to cope with a group of trouble-making trailherders when he breaks his arm. The his younger brother arrives in town and the sheriff swears him in as his deputy. But the older man learns that his brother's idea of law enforcement is to kill any lawbreaker regardless of the crime.

episodes.name: Sundown at Bitter Creek
episodes.overview: A man arrives in the town of Bitter Creek. Though he is trying to live down his past as a gun fighter the stranger learns that his appearance has a decided effect on three of the town's inhabitants.

episodes.name: The Stranger
episodes.overview: Cort McConnell rides into town, when he sees a man running out of the general store and after he wrestles him down they fight until a shot goes off killing the man. With the shopkeeper dead the townspeople charge Cort with the crime.

episodes.name: The Sharpshooter
episodes.overview: Lucas McCain and his son Mark arrive in North Fork, New Mexico. Looking to start a new life, they come across a ranch to their liking, which is for sale.

episodes.name: Man of Fear
episodes.overview: The famed gunman Doc Holliday visits a young married couple who are friends of his. He learns that the wife holds her husband in contempt because he is paying protection money to a gang of thieves in order to keep his home and ranch safe.

episodes.name: The Doctor Keeps a Promise
episodes.overview: Dr. Allan McMurdo tries to save the life of Dave Bechdolt who was shot when he tried to rob a man so that he could buy some seeds to grow his crops for his family.

episodes.name: Three Days to Death
episodes.overview: An Easterner learns that his brother has been killed out West and sets out to find the murderer. He learns that the killer's identity is known, but that the law does not have the men to go after him.

episodes.name: Shadow of a Dead Man
episodes.overview: Logan Wheeler seeks Raney Benson, a wanted bank robber for the reward money. Logan's father is close to losing his ranch and Logan sets out to help him.

episodes.name: Debt of Gratitude
episodes.overview: Marshal Cam Tolby faces the enmity of the townspeople when he tries to take an outlaw to Prescott, Ariz., to stand trial for robbery and murder. His difficulties increase when the outlaw, despite handcuffs, manages to save a group of schoolchildren from disaster.

episodes.name: A Handful of Ashes
episodes.overview: Old timer Ben Carey wants to become Deputy but the town thinks he's too old for the job. He takes in a man with a snake bite and realizes that he is outlaw Jerrod Toll.

episodes.name: Threat of Violence
episodes.overview: A gunman, tired of violence, hangs up his guns and tries to make a new life for himself as an attorney. But he finds that his reputation as a gunman hinders him. Then he takes the case of a man whose past record makes him the prime suspect in a murder case.

episodes.name: Utopia, Wyoming
episodes.overview: A clan of Confederates from Georgia looking for a new way of life settle in a deserted Wyoming ghost town that they have named 'Utopia'.

episodes.name: Trail to Nowhere
episodes.overview: Julie Holman swears vengeance when her husband is murdered. Suspecting Carl Benson, a man with whom her husband has quarreled, Julie rides out to his ranch. She finds that Benson has disappeared and sets out to track him down.

episodes.name: The Scaffold
episodes.overview: An embittered man shoots one of the leading citizens.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Though Adam Larkin has spent many years trying to make a living from his land, he has only met with failure. When his wife tells him that she is expecting a child, Larkin goes to the bank and asks for a loan, but the bank refuses it. Larkin decides to take what he needs.

episodes.name: The Accuser
episodes.overview: After discovering the body of a murdered rancher, Milo Brant tries to comfort the grieving widow. The widow's little son, however distrusts Brant and resents the man's attentions to his mother.

episodes.name: Legacy of a Legend
episodes.overview: A drifter arrives in a small Western town claiming to be a famous lawman who had lived there years before. The townspeople, who remember the lawman as a young and vigorous man, refuse to believe him.

episodes.name: To Sit in Judgment
episodes.overview: When a youngster bites off more trouble than he can chew a sympathetic sheriff takes the hard course on teaching him a lesson.

episodes.name: The Tall Shadow
episodes.overview: Linc Hardway's father is one of the wealthiest men in the West. In his efforts to prove that he can do anything as well as his father, Linc encounters one failure after another, until even the girl he loves loses respect for him. Then Hardway's father is murdered and he is suspected of the crime.

episodes.name: The Vaunted
episodes.overview: Wanted criminal Jess Matson has been on the run for over a year, he heads back to visit his family and encounters a surprise ambush.

episodes.name: Pressure Point
episodes.overview: Jess Clark becomes blind when his horse breaks his leg in a gopher hole in Top Rock, a small town that wants nothing to do with gunfighters. After a prison break Lew Banning goes after Clark who killed his brother not caring that the old timer is blind now.

episodes.name: Bury Me Dead
episodes.overview: Lorimer is forced to help outlaw Redfern, who is holding Jed's wife hostage, with a Marshal on the trail of Redfern, Lorimer is trying desperately to protect Redfern in order to keep her alive.

episodes.name: Let the Man Die
episodes.overview: Dr. Reynolds faces a painful temptation - if he allows a patient to die, his son's future will be assured.

episodes.name: Medal for Valor
episodes.overview: David Manning asks Rufus Stewart for money so he can relocate to a warmer climate due to his wife's illness. The catch is that he serve in the U.S. Armory under Stewart's sons name for so that his son can run for U.S. senate.

episodes.name: Living is a Lonesome Thing
episodes.overview: A wealthy rancher is trying to monopolize the cattle drives leaving Texas. Small ranchers are trying to put their own drive together. The wealthy rancher hires a man's wayward son to sabotage the effort.

episodes.name: Day of the Killing
episodes.overview: Blacksmith Jonas Sutton is elected sheriff. After he takes office, townfolk pressure him into hunting down a murderer who previously had saved Sutton's son.

episodes.name: Hang the Heart High
episodes.overview: Discontented with her marriage, Regan Moore attracts the love of gunman Dix Porter with serious consequences.

episodes.name: Welcome Home a Stranger
episodes.overview: After the Civil War, lawman Ben Sanderson returns to his Southern home to find things very changed.

episodes.name: Trail Incident
episodes.overview: Andy McCall comes across a teenage boy wandering through the country. The boy, Peter Owens tells of being thrown by a horse, and his father is Tim Owens, the biggest banker in Chicago. Back at camp Charlie the cook who's been crippled by an accident is bitter he can never partner Andy like they'd always dreamed. The cattle drive continues and Peter starts to adapt to camp life, first as a cook's helper and then as one of the riders. Charlie tells the boy he will stake him a ticket for the stagecoach when they get close to a nearby town. Arriving at Redcliff Charlie ...

episodes.name: Make It Look Good
episodes.overview: When Sam Carter refuses to accept his share of stolen money, he inadvertently places his wife Jenny's life in jeopardy. Carter's companions in crime suspect that he has informed on them.

episodes.name: A Thread of Respect
episodes.overview: Gino Pelleti, an immigrant tailor, opens a shop in Yucca City. He and his son are subjected to cruel pranks, but he doesn't believe in violence and refuses to defend himself.

episodes.name: Deadfall
episodes.overview: A gunman just out of prison is framed for robbery, convicted and sent back to prison. On the way, outlaws kill the sheriff and kidnap the prisoner.

episodes.name: The Last Raid
episodes.overview: Miguel and his gang get away from the band with several thousand pesos in gold. But Miguel is betrayed by one of his men, who steals the gold, takes Miguel's girl and her younger brother, and escapes to a hiding place in the mountains.

episodes.name: Man Alone
episodes.overview: A father determines that his son must kill Johnny Ringo in order to establish himself as the best gunfighter.

episodes.name: Hanging Fever
episodes.overview: Sam Walston, a town leader, sets out to bring justice to a small town after a murder. A suspect suddenly leaves town and the people don't want to wait for a trial. What Walston doesn't know is that his own wife is the suspect's alibi.

episodes.name: Trouble at Tres Cruces
episodes.overview: After many years away from his family, Dave Blasingame is asked to return home.

episodes.name: Heritage
episodes.overview: Victor Bers grows bitter when his son deserts their farm to join the Confederate Army.

episodes.name: The Sunrise Gun
episodes.overview: Bitter memories plague old Johnny Sunrise, one-time gunslinger.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: The story of Ward Pendleton, an examiner for a chain of banks, as he travels throughtout the old west.

episodes.name: Mission To Marathon
episodes.overview: Gil Durand, dishonorably discharged from the Army, is asked by the government to locate an Army major.

episodes.name: The Law and the Gun
episodes.overview: John Welker's new bride is killed by bank robbers. John goes undercover to try and infiltrate the gang.

episodes.name: Interrogation
episodes.overview: After being captured by the Mexican Army, Captain Kraig holds fast to the interrogation concerning the whereabouts of the coming troops.

episodes.name: The Lone Woman
episodes.overview: An Indian is skulking around a ranch house and kills the eldest son of the family living there. The mother is filled with hate and wants him dead. Soon the Indian returns.

episodes.name: Confession
episodes.overview: A New York newspaper reporter comes West to do a story on Sheriff Agate Slade. He forms an immediate dislike for the sheriff.

episodes.name: The Lonely Gun
episodes.overview: An outlaw returns home to see his brother. He finds that his brother is dead. His nephew has sold the ranch to pay debts and is about to set out on a life of getting rich fast.

episodes.name: Hand on the Latch
episodes.overview: A man is shot while escaping from an army prison camp during the civil war. He happens upon a small farm house where there are two women alone.

episodes.name: Shadows
episodes.overview: Loy Bannister is the town's most powerful figure because of his political and economic influence. In a wild bid to gain Bannister's admiration, young Branch Neeley agrees to stand trial for a murder he didn't commit.

episodes.name: Mission
episodes.overview: At a frontier cavalry post, a newly arrived black trooper must earn the respect and trust of his fellow cavalrymen, most of whom are white and don't want a black in their outfit.

episodes.name: Lonesome Road
episodes.overview: Marshall Ben Clark cleaned up the town, but now he is going to far in his effort to suppress dissent. The townspeople decide he needs to leave town. He doesn't want to leave quietly.

episodes.name: King of the Valley
episodes.overview: A wealthy rancher is blamed for missing funds at a bank.

episodes.name: Rebel Range
episodes.overview: A strong willed woman and her son return to their old home to find it occupied by a former civil war soldier who refuses to leave.

episodes.name: Death in a Wood
episodes.overview: Two Confederate soldiers, sent into the woods on a reconnaissance mission, suddenly realize that they are being watched.

episodes.name: The Grubstake
episodes.overview: Released after a long prison term, prospector Jim Goad is ready to resume panning for gold and he plans to take his son with him. But the boy who was raised by friends of Jim's has fallen in with a bad crowd.

episodes.name: The Ghost
episodes.overview: Marshal Monty Elstrode is captured by an outlaw gang who are planning to organize a new Confederate Army. Elstrode is shocked to learn that the leader of the group is the supposedly dead murderer of President Lincoln, John Wilkes Booth.

episodes.name: Miss Jenny
episodes.overview: Jenny Breckenridge is unhappy with her life. She would much rather be back in the city, where she comes from. than out west with her husband, a lazy drunk. A good-looking young cowboy who stops by sparks her interest, but then the man announces that he has a plan--he's going to take Jenny as his own, and to show that he means business he shoots her husband.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: Mace, a cattleman, hates sheepherders because he believes that sheep ruin good grazing land.

episodes.name: Wayfarers
episodes.overview: A forlorn young woman comes to a hostile village to tell her husband, who has been working there, she is pregnant.

episodes.name: Picture of Sal
episodes.overview: Jed a former spy during the Civil War shows up in a Nevada casino run by Sal, whom he left standing at the altar years before.

episodes.name: Never Too Late
episodes.overview: Ginger Rogers plays a land-hungry woman who hires a gunman to help her.

episodes.name: Man in the Middle
episodes.overview: An Indian agent has a double task: convincing the townspeople that a young man deserves punishment for shooting an Indian and arresting the culprit.

episodes.name: Guns for Garibaldi
episodes.overview: Townspeople are disappointed when Giulio Mandati comes to Indian Creek to take over his brother's gold claim. They had hoped that the gold would be used to pay for a much needed dam. What they don't know is that Giulio is an impostor who plans to use the riches to finance Garibaldi's Italian revolt.

episodes.name: The Sunday Man
episodes.overview: Sheriff Walt Devlin and his brother, Deputy Bill Devlin, are alike in name only. Walt is a letter-of-the-law man who believes the end does not justify the means. Bill's methods are sometimes questionable and certain citizens suspect that he's a lawman purely for the thrill of gunslinging.

episodes.name: Set-Up
episodes.overview: When a rancher is set-up for a crime he did not commit he finds out more than he needed to know.

episodes.name: A Small Town That Died
episodes.overview: An ex-convict hears about a good ranch job - but he arrives to find the rancher murdered.

episodes.name: Killer Instinct
episodes.overview: McGill acts the big man in town and makes the sheriff look bad to the townspeople.

episodes.name: Sundown Smith
episodes.overview: After Bobby's mother is murdered by Outlaw Jesse Harp, he runs into Sundown Smith and sets him up for the fall as the murderer.

episodes.name: Calico Bait
episodes.overview: Deputy Sam Anders is looking for Davey Morse for the murder of a shopkeeper.

episodes.name: Seed of Evil
episodes.overview: Malachi West has developed a bitter hatred for the Union secret-service man who was responsible for his son's death during the war. The townspeople are very afraid of West until Sam Brady comes to town.

episodes.name: Deception
episodes.overview: In an effort to thwart thieving outlaws that rob their stagecoaches, the stage-line's main operators come up with a plan that is not only unorthodox but risky as well.

episodes.name: Stagecoach to Yuma
episodes.overview: Marshal Dave Harmon heads for Yuma to end the lawless reign of a notorious woman.

episodes.name: A Gun for Willie
episodes.overview: When simple Willie receives a reward for killing an outlaw he becomes the big man in town, until it turns out that Willie killed the wrong man.

episodes.name: Desert Flight
episodes.overview: Brenner, Doyle and Sandy are a trio of bank robbers, who've come up with a really slick plan. But Brenner, the mastermind, hasn't taken Doyle's itchy trigger finger into account.

episodes.name: Cry Hope! Cry Hate!
episodes.overview: After her son goes missing a search party goes out looking for the youngster.

episodes.name: The Ox
episodes.overview: A former Confederate soldier who has spent some long years in prison, Ox has only one thing in mind - revenge on his old commanding officer for putting him behind bars.

episodes.name: So Young the Savage Land
episodes.overview: Beth and Jim Brayden have struggled to keep their ranch when the greed of a neighboring rancher tries to lay claim to their land.

episodes.name: Ransom
episodes.overview: Comanche Indians raid a shepherd's camp, killing all the hands except an itinerant cowboy named Dundee. He doesn't have to wait long before he learns why he have to wait long before he learns why he was spared. The Indians plan to trade him for horses and guns.

episodes.name: The Last Bugle
episodes.overview: Geronimo and his renagades are on the warpath again. Army officer Gatewood heads for the Mexican Sierras with two Apache prisoners to try and talk the ruthless leader into surrender.

episodes.name: The Black Wagon
episodes.overview: Sarah Harmon is traveling in a wagon train which halts at the scene of an Apache raid.

episodes.name: Knife of Hate
episodes.overview: Dr. Pittman's daughter is held hostage until the good doctor performs surgery on one of the outlaws.

episodes.name: The Mormons
episodes.overview: Matt Rowland is determined to prevent Mormons from entering into Joshua City after he hears there is cholera aboard the wagon train. His son Tod begins to question his father's motives after he meets a young lady from the train.

episodes.name: The Man From Yesterday
episodes.overview: An old-time gunslinger named Mapes gets out of prison and returns to track down John Duncan, the man who framed him many years ago.

episodes.name: Morning Incident
episodes.overview: Laurie Pritchard is a farm girl engaged to a farm boy but the farm life isn't consistent with her dreams. Then she meets a man who might be able to make her dreams come true.

episodes.name: Ambush
episodes.overview: Union Army Col. Blackburn commands a squad of mercenary soldiers whose current mission is to get vital papers through Confederate lines. There's an air of mutiny as the mercenaries complain about the dangerous duty.

episodes.name: One Must Die
episodes.overview: John Baylor is summoned to the home of a friend of his fathers. The man is dying and wishes to leave everything to one of his two daughters. John wants to find out why one daughter is excluded.

episodes.name: The Long Shadow
episodes.overview: Widow Amy Lawson's son, a Cavalry Officer, is killed in action. Amy blames Major Sinclair for her son's death. The major isn't just the Cavalry commander - he's Amy's fiance.

episodes.name: Blood Red
episodes.overview: Jess Whiting is a driven man, he is afraid that the Indian uprising is because of his Indian wife and that she will be taken from him.

episodes.name: Honor Bright
episodes.overview: Ex-convict Ed Dubro has reluctantly agreed to his daughter's marriage to Vince Harwell. But on the wedding day, Laurie learns that Vince is already married.

episodes.name: The Broken Wing
episodes.overview: Lyman now a cripple, years ago tried to fly through the air under his own power. Now Lyman's nephew Thalian is determined to do the same thing.

episodes.name: The Silent Sentry
episodes.overview: A wintery outpost leaves the last two soldiers, one a Rebel the other Confederate to survive their blistering hatred.

episodes.name: The Bible Man
episodes.overview: Jimmy Pierce holds his father, a religious preacher responsible for the death of his mother.

episodes.name: The Scar
episodes.overview: The scar on Jesse Martin's life is his memory of his months in a prison camp during the Civil War.

episodes.name: Knight of the Sun
episodes.overview: Henry Jacob Hanley, a drunken desert rat, is just making himself at home in a deserted fort when he acquires some company. Beth Woodfield arrives on a mission taken over from her dead father- delivering the new Gatling gun to the troops in Mexico.

episodes.name: A Warm Day in Heaven
episodes.overview: In the sleepy decent town of Heaven, evil arrives in the form of Nick Finn, as Michael Peters soon finds out he is the only one not swayed by the devil.

episodes.name: The Empty Shell
episodes.overview: Madden a cowardly farmer is fearful that not only are they after his land but his wife as well.

episodes.name: The Atoner
episodes.overview: New Bethlehem, Arizona, has no saloons or gambling halls because of the House of Matthew religious sect which inhabits it.

episodes.name: Man from Everywhere
episodes.overview: Sheriff Jed Morgan is worried about his prisoner, Tom Bowdry, because the local gentry seems to be getting lynch fever. Morgan hires guide Branch Taylor to hustle Bowdry to the nearby town of Borrego.

episodes.name: The Release
episodes.overview: Prisoner Lee DuVal could go free by working for the governor of Texas.

episodes.name: Storm Over Eden
episodes.overview: Chet Loring, Ellen Gaynor, and Billie Gaynor grew up together in the same house. Chet wants to marry Ellen but accidentally shoots and kills Billie. Now Ellen and Billie's father wants to hang Chet.

episodes.name: Image of a Drawn Sword
episodes.overview: Union Lieutenant Sam Kenyon informs the citizens of an isolated Rebel community that some rookie troops will be camping near there for a few days. For the sake of their own health, he offers the townspeople a warning - don't taunt the young soldiers.

episodes.name: Jericho
episodes.overview: A woman sentenced to hang for the murder of her husband is sent a second chance by a Government Agent.
